__e: I say, Poirot, you're beginning to make me feel badly about all this.
Yeah, he's gonna freak that I told you, but I just don't want him to get in trouble because I'm the one who twisted his arm for him to be here.
I'm sorry I talked you into buying this place.
/I wasn't keen at first /but I'm really glad that Daniel /persuaded me to get it done.
I mean, I am the one who convinced her, after all.
You remember the last time he talked you into something?
Someone talked his way into the homes of two women and didn't leave till they were dead.
Your old man gives him a song about waiting a few weeks, then giving 50%.
And I got suckered into managing it after we got married just like she wanted.
Since there is no mystery for me to solve... Colonel Carbury has persuaded me to visit the town of Acre with him.
Did you need to talk to me or did Dad conveniently bump into you and con you into doing his dirty work?
Now, I'll bet that Laura convinced Cheever to tell the truth and that you killed him to stop it.
Thank you for convincing me to go back to the party.
So, I just wanted to say that you getting Mom to let me play last night was really cool.
